named-query.name: AUDIT_HISTORY_FOR_SITE
named-query.query: SELECT audit FROM com.mpower.domain.Audit audit WHERE audit.site = :site

named-query.name: AUDIT_HISTORY_FOR_ENTITY
named-query.query: SELECT audit FROM com.mpower.domain.Audit audit WHERE audit.site = :site AND audit.entityType = :entityType AND audit.objectId = :objectId

named-query.name: AUDIT_HISTORY_FOR_PERSON
named-query.query: SELECT audit FROM com.mpower.domain.Audit audit WHERE audit.person.id = :personId
